nodes.documentation: @dev Create a modifer that checks if the msg.sender is the owner of the contract
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Create a modifer that checks if the msg.value is greater than the fee required to create thread

nodes.documentation: @dev Create a modifer that checks if the msg.value is greater than the fee required to reply

nodes.documentation: @dev Create a modifer that checks if the contract is paused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set initial fee while deploying the contract
 @param _feeNewThread Fee required to create new thread (uint256), _feeReplyThread Fee required for replying to a thread (uint256)

@notice Owner can pause the contract
 @dev Owner can call this function to toggle contract isPaused state
nodes.name: toggleContractActive
setFees
withdraw
createThread
replyThread
